text.__SUMMARY__: Acacia nivea is a shrub of the genus Acacia and the subgenus Plurinerves. It is native to an area in the southern Wheatbelt and Goldfields-Esperance regions of Western Australia.The low spreading shrub typically grows to a height of 0.4 to 1 metre (1 to 3 ft). It blooms from July to September and produces yellow flowers.
